name: East Trapper
description:
Looking for an adventure game with traps to keep you on your toes! Then look no further!
To complete this game you must make your way through different levels of traps with twists and turns.
Future level updates will be made available!


"I had a blast playing this game" - Left4Dead 2 No.1 jockey, Old Man Scraps

Features
- 2D Adventure game
- Hidden Traps to figure out
- 9 "Levels" to complete with more to come
- Once completed you can try to complete in the fastest time
